etymons.meaning: to compare, make similar; to imitate, make like

Infectum.turoyo: m-larwal g-domən la-emre DD 393/6; Реализация слова “бараны” непонятна - не могу нормализовать
translations: von aussen ähneln sie den Lammern

Infectum.turoyo: i=naqla d-šləḥle l-u=zangīn aǧ=ǧul-ayḏe, ko-ʕobər u=malaxo w-ko-lowəš aǧ=ǧule d-u=zangīn w-ko-mdame ruḥe b-u=zangin-ano
translations: ‘When the rich man took off his clothes, the angel entered [the bathhouse], put on the rich man’s clothes and made himself similar to him’; 419; 43/9;
